modShortDescription: With this 7 Days to Die mod scrap time for items and blocks are halved by 50% for A17 and A18 game versions. Now you will finish your works faster.
modDescription:
With this 7 Days to Die mod scrap time for items and blocks are halved by 50% for A17 and A18 game versions. Now you will finish your works faster.

[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=12KUGwHL8pSBzxE635rj0ESbK2OiO4sdu) for A17.4  
[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1n-8eis3zAumkkWPBrRiBs8aNOLsRsLiI) for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15790-gg2015s-collection-of-a18-modlets/).

**Credits:** [GG2015](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gg2015/)
